basics.name: SANDEEP KUMAR
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with expertise in building enterprise applications using AI-accelerators, React, Node.js, FastAPI, and AWS. Experienced in developing scalable full-stack solutions with AI-assisted development tools like Amazon Q Developer and Kiro AI.

work.name: Avasoft
work.summary: Engineering FastAPI backends and React frontends for enterprise applications using AI-assisted development tools, serving 1,000+ daily users.

Developed Absence Tracker leave management system, streamlining approvals for 500+ employees.
